game.name: Scraps - Hellmouth Creek
game.shortDescription: A cozy horror scrapbooking adventure. Ride bikes, float down rivers, and explore the woods while capturing photos and arranging your own scrapbook pages.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cozy horror scrapbooking adventure. Ride bikes, float down rivers, and explore the woods while capturing photos and arranging your own scrapbook pages.
